paperchase.translation[0].definitions[0]: an administrative process that takes more time and uses more documents than seem reasonable
It is possible to claim back the tax, but this involves something of a paperchase.
paperchase.translation[0].definitions[1]: an occasion when a company sells a lot of new shares to finance a series of takeovers
paperchase.translation[0].definitions[2]: a very careful search through a large amount of documents or books
It took a long paperchase through the archives to find the report.
